remarks: Write the set of complex polynomials in a subring in terms of the abstract polynomial construction.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-Jul-2015.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 29-Sep-2019.)
statement:
plypf1.r $e |- R = ( CCfld |`s S ) $.
plypf1.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
plypf1.a $e |- A = ( Base ` P ) $.
plypf1.e $e |- E = ( eval1 ` CCfld ) $.
plypf1 $p |- ( S e. ( SubRing ` CCfld ) -> ( Poly ` S ) = ( E " A ) ) $.
